author: danny
msg: Made some alterations to provide datasource access through the Mailet API.
This removes the final "hidden" dependancy on Avalon from James' standard mailets,
and provides an agnostic method of getting connections for Mailet developers

author: danny
msg: Replaced import of deprecated class with explicit cast to deprecated class
This cast can be removed when calls to org.apache.avalon.cornerstone.services.connection.ConnectionManager
This appears to be largely a name refactoring issue, and probaly requires we update
